title: Is the Mazda MX-5 Any Good? - /CHRIS HARRIS ON CARS
description: Chris Harris has been known to not like the Mazda MX-5, even calling it dirty words in an article a few years back. Now he gets to support his point by swapping his Ferrari 599 with Cameraman and Editor Neil Carey's NA Mazda MX-5.  Was Chris wrong a few years ago?
